name: Ananya Tiwari
greetingText: Your name is as beautiful as your heart, my cutiepie pookie!
wishText: May love, joy, and endless happiness always surround you—just like my arms around you! ❤️
text1: It's your special day, my love! 🥰
textInChatBox: Happy 25th Birthday, my cutiepie pookie!! 🎉🎂 You are my happiness, my dream, my everything!
text2: I was going to send a simple wish...
text4: Because I wanted to make it
text5Content: You are my heartbeat, my forever love, my most precious gift! 💖
outroText: Now, come back and tell me how much you loved this! Or just let me hug you tight! 🤗
replayText: Or click here to relive the magic again!
